First-Time Buyer Tip Tuesday! ğŸ’¡ Before you start house hunting, get that pre-approval letter! It's like having cash in your pocket - sellers take you seriously and you'll know exactly what you can afford. Plus in multiple offer situations, it can be the difference between getting your dream home or losing it to someone else. Questions? I'm here to help! ğŸ

January Market Update! ğŸ“Š Our local market is still HOT! Average home prices up 8.2% from last year and we only have 2.1 months of inventory (6 months is considered balanced). Seller Sunday Tips! ğŸ’° Want to add value to your home without breaking the bank? Try these: Fresh paint (especially neutrals), update light fixtures, deep clean EVERYTHING, and consider staging key rooms. These small changes can literally add thousands to your sale price!
